name: XCL Property Management
details: Site built for a property management group in Orland Park, IL. Allows the property managers to show their locations and connect with current and future tenants.

name: Rebie's Bakery
details: Website for an independent bakery business. Space for the baker to show off their creations, while providing a menu and contact form for customers.

name: Git Repo Tracker
details: A React website built for developers that takes a public git URL and visualizes all commits, branches, and details from the repo. Allows users to download commit details in their preferred data format.

name: Helayna Fuller Photography
details: A site for a freelance photographer to showcase their work and connect with future clients.
